description.value: This ValueSet combines two SNOMED CT UK Refsets to allow selection of a code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes an Adverse Reaction Propensity or an Allergy Reaction. This incorporates any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Adverse Reaction propensity' subset with subset original id 1011000000131; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Adverse reaction propensity simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000261000000107. This also incorporates any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Allergy Propensity' subset with subset original id 1101000000130; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Allergy propensity simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000291000000101.
